trans-unit.source: Specifies the lifetime of a performance counter instance.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tempo de vida de uma instância de contador de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is Global, which specifies the removal of the performance counter instance when no counters are using the process category.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão é Global, que especifica a remoção da instância do contador de desempenho quando nenhum contador estiver usando a categoria do processo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.CategoryType%2A> property is <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType>, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> value for the performance counter must be Global.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.CategoryType%2A>é de propriedade <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType>, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A>valor para o contador de desempenho deve ser Global.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.InstanceLifetime%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.CategoryType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Remove the performance counter instance when no counters are using the process category.
trans-unit.target: Remova a instância do contador de desempenho quando nenhum contador estiver usando a categoria do processo.

trans-unit.source: Remove the performance counter instance when the process is closed.
trans-unit.target: Remova a instância do contador de desempenho quando o processo é fechado.
